title: Έρωτας με Διαφορά
overview: The series Έρωτας με Διαφορά is an emotional, family comedy of sixty-minute weekly episodes, which comments with humor, romance and optimism, the characters and situations of a modern Greek family, aspiring to concern the entire age range of TV viewers.Themes such as single-parent families and the problems they experience, diversity and the way it is treated and, above all, the love that filters and defines everything are presented through a pleasant comic point of view, with warmth and optimism.
